Name: Top Burger
About the game: Top Burger is an exciting fast food simulation game. You just opened a burger restaurant, let's see if you can put together burgers fast enough to satisfy your ever growing number of customers! The game also comes with many achievements and a 'create your burger' mode which lets you build super high burgers, taking advantage of all the unlocked items. Game Features: - More than 150 levels - Hours of gameplay - Three game modes - Dozens of types to deliver to your customers
